long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HintSystem lets you add a welcome screen, hints, tool tips, and other user assistance to any website or web application.  It gives UX managers / product owners / UA writers the tools they need to reach users where users want to be helped-- IN CONTEXT.

See hintsystem.com for more.
